content: please note that the paid pattern is the ad-free and printable pdf version of a free online pattern on supergurumi com **free english version** https //www supergurumi com/crochet-around-a-cord-cord-ivy **free german version** https //www supergurumi de/kabel-umhaekeln-kabel-efeu **free spanish version** https //www supergurumi com/es/como-tejer-los-cables-hiedra-para-cables **free french version** https //www supergurumi com/fr/crocheter-autour-dun-cable-lierre-de-cable **free dutch version** https //www supergurumi com/nl/haak-rond-een-kabel-kabelklimop **about the pattern ** the crochet pattern comes as a printable pdf and is available in english us terminology german spanish french and dutch the pattern is written in detail and extensively illustrated available as an instant download after purchase **materials used ** this pattern was crocheted using the schachenmayr catania yarn 100% cotton meterage 125 m yarn ball weight 50 g yarn weight sport - 5ply / fine 2 in the following colors moss moos 412 apple apfel 205 2 5 mm crochet hook scissors **techniques you need to know ** slip knot chain stitch slip_stitch single_crochet single_crochet double_crochet treble_crochet double treble_crochet decrease / increase color change ***have fun crocheting ***
